text: Anqareeb woh waqt aane wala hai jab hum munkireen e haqq ke dilon mein roab (terror/darr) bitha denge, isliye ke unhon ne Allah ke saath unko khudayi mein shareek thehraya hai jinke shareek honay par Allah ne koi sanad nazil nahin ki, unka aakhri thikana jahannum hai aur bahut hi buri hai woh qayaam-gaah jo un zalimon ko naseeb hogi
